aboutpara:
I am a Full Stack Developer with a Bachelor's degree in Applied Computer Technology and 5+ years of experience in React, React Native, TypeScript, and Node.js. Currently, I work as a senior mobile developer in Kenya, specializing in fintech applications with a strong focus on security, performance, and user experience.

I have collaborated with global teams across Africa, Europe, and Hong Kong, delivering scalable web and mobile solutions. My expertise includes biometric authentication, AWS Liveness Detection, and Strong Customer Authentication (SCA).
